slide.title: UTF 16 Surrogates
slide.blurb: As UTF-16 is supposed to encode the full Unicode character set.

list.bullet: UTF-16 uses a double two-byte sequence for characters outside the BMP
Special ranges in the Unicode range are used for this

slide.example:
byte 1 = 0xd800 - 0xdbff byte 2 = 0xdc00 - 0xdfff
𐐘 U+10418 DESERET CAPITAL LETTER GAY 0xd810 0xdc18
